Node.definition: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to reign|to be king|to be queen|to become king|to become queen
Node.definition: = state in which humans or deities are in a position of royal authority over a group of people

Node.gloss: to tremble|to shake|to quake|to be disturbed|to be perturbed|to be excited|to flutter
Node.definition: = process by which humans or objects shake involuntarily; ◄ typically as a result of fear, insecurity, shock, excitement, or other emotions
= action by which humans or deities assume a position of leadership, ◄ as if sitting on an actual throne
= heavenly creature with wings, ► carrying the throne of God, symbol of God's majesty, and associated with his presence

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain; ► that part of Jerusalem (יְרוּשָׁלַ͏ִם) on which the temple was built, also known as a fortress and stronghold, city of David (דָּוִד) YHWH's dwelling place
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans publicly admit their own shortcomings before God, or the shortcomings of the people they represent
literally: name; hence: = the core of one's identity, which reflect the essence of one's being
= state in which an event has a high intensity
= state in which humans, deities, places and activities have qualities that inspire fear in others

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which a person, supernatural being, animal, substance, or force has the ability to exert great force
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= practices that conform to the laws of God
= state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
literally: to establish; hence: = causative process by which deities cause a certain condition to become stable so that it can be expected to last for a long time
literally: smoothness; hence: = state in which an event is morally and ethically right
= practices that conform to the laws of God

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= a low stool; ► for resting the feet on when sitting; ≈ often associated with authority

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) brother of Moses (מֹשֶׁה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► first high priest (כֹּהֵן)
= person ordained (מלא) and consecrated (קדשׁ) to perform religious services on behalf of others
= man; ◄ son of Elkanah (אֶלְקָנָה) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► judge and prophet (נָבִיא)
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity
= action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= something shaped like a pillar (a cloud, fire, smoke)
= a visible collection of condensed water vapor hanging in the atmosphere, often high above the ground ≈ also used to represent God's presence and activity

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= a pattern of behavior required by somebody in authority
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
literally: to bear; hence: = action by which humans or deities let go of any anger or resentment with regard to the wrongdoing or sin of (other) humans
= action in which humans or deities harm (other) humans in return for an injury or wrong, and so find relief from their anger
= a pattern of activities performed by a person or deity, with the primary focus on whether these activities are good or evil
= action by which humans acknowledge the elevated status of deities and give expression to that
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans lay themselves down on the ground in front of another human or a deity, ► as an act of submission or respect
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= state in which by which humans or objects have become part of the realm of God and his service ► and therefore no longer accessible to humans unless they have gone through special rituals

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
